The perfect place to satisfy any pasta craving! You fill out a little slip and hand it in and get to watch the stuff be made right in front of you. I had the tagliatelle with the mushroom sauce and added sun dried tomatoes. It was totally delicious. They even give you the option to have your pasta cooked hard or soft! They've also got whole wheat and stuffed pasta options (like raviolis).The service is also super quick and friendly. Would definitely recommend. A little pricey though once you start adding on ingredients.
